name: Sun 01 ☢ (Ghost Series)
description:
A single pulse of radiation from a distant star


Created with self-built, modular, generative video performance tool (built in Quartz Composer circa 2011) based on feedback and 3D geometry. This generative tool no longer functions due to antiquated technology, all that remains is a handful of archival recordings; Ghost Series collection.

Sun recordings were made circa 2013. Moire pixel animation comes from overlapped & offset instances of geometric objects
